'''Déjà Vu!''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to continuously sail their [[Waverider]] at high speeds for a certain period of time, and fully deplete their engine [[stamina]].

==Trivia==
* This achievement is named after the eponymous {{w|Eurobeat}} song from Italian DJ {{w|Dave Rodgers}}, featured in street racing anime ''{{w|Initial D}}''.
